name: Alien Prison Escape
description:
Jason has found himself in prison and recognizes that prison life isn't cut out for him. Luckily, an alien crashes into his cell with an offer. Help the alien fix his spaceship and it'll help you escape.

A short game made in AGS (Adventure Game Studio) in a month for the monthly MAGS competition. Dec 2022: "One Big Room".

Credits:

Most of the stuff: Bulbapuck

Music:

Leaving home, Bass Walker, Spy glass: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Sound effects from Freesound.org, all under public domain
